name: Miss Right? | 舔到最后 应有尽有
name_original: Miss Right? | 舔到最后 应有尽有
description:
This is A story about Miss Right. "TIangou" is a Chinese internet word. Means A man, who love a Girl, Give everything to the Gril,but GIrl do not accept him.

Just like Miss Right, but your Miss right do not think you are Mr Right.

So, This game is a story about "TIangou" but it a consummate Story, FInally you will marry with her,but.


The game includes:



1. Beautiful character

2. About 10000 words

3. More than 20 scenes, conversations with countless "TIangou"

4. 5 good songs.

5. Many options of licking failure if you choose wrong
